author: Jon Hilsenrath
title: Under Trump, a Strong Economy but Murky Policy Outlook
text:
During Barack Obamaâ€™s presidency, uncertainty about U.S. economic policy was much higher than it had been during the previous 25 years, according to calculations by a trio of academic economists.
You would think uncertainty would be low now, with economic expansion advanced and secure, the global economy on a stable footing, and a president in the White House focused on helping business by cutting regulation.
But...
